thread.title: Carlos Ramos

author: Carlos Ramos
title: Carlos Ramos
text: We rented a Hyundai Creta for our family (couple +2 children) but as that model was not available at that moment we were upgraded to a Hyundai Elantra. The car was brand new, in perfect condition and we did not experience any problem at all with it during our stay. The staff at Econorent were very friendly and explained in detail important aspects to consider when driving in Chile. When we returned the car, the inspection and the paperwork were very fast, and again, the staff were very friendly and efficient.
